Texto: 
negative
none
• 2.5 cm hypothalamic mass
• irregular heterogeneous enhancement
• no hydrocephalus
• no mass in sella turcica
hypothalamic glioma
• hypothalamic-chiasmic glioma
• hypothalamic hamartoma
• craniopharyngioma
• pituitary macroadenoma
10 year old girl presents with migraine headaches
had mri to evaluate for possible mass.
the overwhelming majority of hypothalamic and chiasmatic gliomas are pilocytic astrocytomas - a who grade 1 neoplasm.
